summary: This add to the Game Craftable Ebony Crossbow & Bolt
descriptionHtml:
Reaper\'s Ebony Crossbow & Bolt
By Reaper9111

This add to the game:

- Ebony Crossbow
- Ebony Bolt

This is a remake of my Deadric Version since a very cool daedric version was made by someone else and that it was better than mine, i decided to rename mine to Ebony, ppl seem to think it suit it better to be called Ebony, So here you go ! 
The stats are a lil less compare to my Daedric version...(Daedric Version was removed from Nexus)
A Better Daedric Crossbow as just been released !
Both are not enchanted... You can Craft it at the original location in game (Dawguard)
The Crossbow & Bolt are both making More Damage compared to the vanilla version... 
(all this is based on the Steel Crossbow and Dwarven Crossbow) 
I quickly made a mathematical formula to figured what would be the result if all Crossbow would have exist...  They are Powerfull !

You need the Oficial DLC for this to work properly !
I\'m not planning any addon for this...
I suggest that you load this .esp right bellow Dawnguard !

As usual DON\'T UPLOAD THIS MOD ANYWHEWRE This is as always a Nexus Exclusive !
For anything else contact me !

Reaper
author: Reaper9111
